mapper.select: SELECT CAREER_ID , GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL , PREVIOUS_COMPANY_NAME , JOB_TITLE , TO_CHAR(HIRE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') HIRE_DATE , TO_CHAR(RESIGN_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') RESIGN_DATE FROM CAREER WHERE GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL = #{_parameter} ORDER BY HIRE_DATE DESC
SELECT GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL , SELF_INTRO , JOB_ID , REGION , TIER_ID , GITHUB_URL , ADDITIONAL_EMAIL , BLOG_URL FROM GENERAL_MEMBER WHERE GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL = #{_parameter}
SELECT EDUCATION_ID , GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL , SCHOOL_NAME , SCHOOL_DEPARTMENT , DEGREES FROM EDUCATION WHERE GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL = #{_parameter} ORDER BY DEGREES DESC
SELECT NICKNAME , PROFILE_PIC , EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL =#{_parameter}
SELECT GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL , SELF_INTRO , JOB_ID , REGION , TIER_ID , GITHUB_URL , ADDITIONAL_EMAIL , BLOG_URL FROM GENERAL_MEMBER WHERE GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL =#{_parameter}
SELECT CODE_CONTENT FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_ID IN(SELECT HASHTAG_ID FROM TECHSTACK WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter})

SELECT GM.GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL , GP.GENERAL_POST_ID , 'POST' TYPE FROM GENERAL_MEMBER GM JOIN GENERAL_POST GP ON GM.GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL = GP.POST_WRITER WHERE GM.GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL = #{_parameter} UNION ALL SELECT GM.GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL , GC.GENERAL_COMMENT_ID , 'COMMENT' FROM GENERAL_MEMBER GM JOIN GENERAL_COMMENT GC ON GM.GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL = GC.COMMENT_WRITER WHERE GC.COMMENT_WRITER = #{_parameter}

SELECT GM.* , T.TIER_NAME , M.PROFILE_PIC FROM ( SELECT * FROM GENERAL_MEMBER ORDER BY TIER_SCORE DESC ) GM JOIN TIER T ON GM.TIER_ID = T.TIER_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON GM.GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL = M.EMAIL WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
